text: Futhi umphrofethi wabo wathi kubona, â€œngempela izimpawu zobukhosi bakhe ukuthi kuyofika kunina ibhokisi phakathi kulona kuyobe kunokuthula okuvela eNkosini yenu nokwasalayo okwashiywa umndeni kaMose nomndeni ka-Aroni liyobe lithwelwe yizingelosi ngempela kulokho kunesibonakaliso kunina uma ningabakholwayo
